_header: Mary of help both day and night / I pray thee…
Subjects: prayers, to Virgin Mary; Virgin Mary, prayers to
_description: An Orison to the Virgin Mary — eight quatrains

Longleat29.First Lines:
Mary of help both day & nyght I pray þe for þy ioies
                    fyveOf grace wille witte & myght Me to amend herein þis
                    lyve…
Longleat29.Last Lines:
…Mary most of wommen meke Al my trust is sette in þeDo
                    þy grace now or I be seke Mary mercy þou haue on me
